params.name: image
params.description: The pipeline handles three types of images:A string containing a http link pointing to an imageA string containing a local path to an imageAn image loaded in PIL directlyThe pipeline accepts either a single image or a batch of images. If given a single image, it can bebroadcasted to multiple questions.For dataset: the passed in dataset must be of type transformers.pipelines.pt_utils.KeyDatasetExample:

return: A dictionary or a list of dictionaries containing the result. The dictionaries contain the following keys
